title: Under Armour and Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson launch first kids collaboration
text: Under Armour Inc. UA, -2.49% UAA, -2.79% and Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson have launched the first kids collection of their collaboration, a line that includes sweatshirts, bags and PR2 shoes. The Project Rock 1 shoe was a popular item, selling out in 30 minutes when it was launched last summer. The latest youth merchandise is part of the new Iron Will collection, which has also brought medal-winning skier Lindsey Vonn on board as a brand ambassador. Under Armour stock has gained 16.1% for the year to date while the S&P 500 index SPX, +0.00% is up 20.3% for the period.
